channel.title: nlin.CD updates on arXiv.org
channel.description: nlin.CD updates on the arXiv.org e-print archive.

item.title: Learning dissipation and instability fields from chaotic dynamics
item.description: arXiv:2502.03456v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: To make predictions or design control, information on local sensitivity of initial conditions and state-space contraction is both central, and often instrumental. However, it is not always simple to reliably determine instability fields or local dissipation rates, due to computational challenges or ignorance of the governing equations. Here, we construct an alternative route towards that goal, by estimating the Jacobian of a discrete-time dynamical system locally from the entries of the transition matrix that approximates the Perron-Frobenius operator for a given state-space partition. Numerical tests on one- and two-dimensional chaotic maps show promising results.
item.dc:creator: Ludovico T Giorgini, Andre N Souza, Domenico Lippolis, Predrag Cvitanovi\'c, Peter Schmid
